Home → Events and activities → Summer holiday activities for children → Summer holiday activities

Summer holiday activities

We've got lots of children's events taking place across our libraries over the summer holidays. Contact your local library to find out about any additional events they have planned.

We're also running the Summer Reading Challenge for 4-11 year-olds and ImagiNation for 10-18 year-olds at all of our libraries.

Filter by library:

Event Library Date Time
Beach Bonkers - 2pm session Chantry Library Fri 26 Jul, 2019 1400
Beach Bonkers - 3pm session Chantry Library Fri 26 Jul, 2019 1500
Bite Size Ballets: Three Little Pigs Southwold Library Mon 29 Jul, 2019 1030
Slime workshop with Just Add Kids Creative Workshops Ipswich County Library Wed 31 Jul, 2019 1030
Galaxy slime workshop with Just Add Kids Creative Workshops Stoke Library Fri 2 Aug, 2019 0930
CoderDojo: for ages 7 - 17 Ipswich County Library Thu 8 Aug, 2019 1415
ZooLab Motley Zoo visit Gainsborough Community Library Fri 9 Aug, 2019 1100
ZooLab Motley Zoo visit Chantry Library Fri 9 Aug, 2019 1500
Slime workshop with Just Add Kids Creative Workshops Ipswich County Library Wed 14 Aug, 2019 1030

Lab in a Library: space-themed workshop for ages 5-12 - 1pm session Sudbury Library Wed 21 Aug, 2019 1300
